de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.controller

Class ChainAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.controller.ChainAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TypeAdapter

    public class ChainAdapter
extends Object
implements TypeAdapter
    A class that is used to create Brat chain to CAS and vice-versa
    Author:
    Seid Muhie Yimam

      • updateCasBeforeDelete

        public void updateCasBeforeDelete(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas aJCas,
                         int aRef)
        Update the Cas before deleting a link. This way, if a link is deleted at the middle, The chain will be splitted into two. If the first link is deleted, the First link will be shifted to the next one.

      • getLabelPrefix

        public String getLabelPrefix()
        Description copied from interface: TypeAdapter
        Prefix of the label value for Brat to make sure that different annotation types can use the same label, e.g. a POS tag "N" and a named entity type "N". This is used to differentiate the different types in the brat annotation/visualization.
        Specified by:
        getLabelPrefix in interface TypeAdapter
